rows.label: qev050906_MSG0001
rows.name: Permit me to apologize for dragging you all this way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050906_MSG0002
rows.name:
I asked for this sparring match precisely because you
are the greatest warrior I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050906_MSG0003
rows.name: I shall consider this match a crucible and test...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050906_MSG0004
rows.name:
A way of determining whether I have the potential to
remake myself as a fighter deserving of respect![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050906_MSG0005
rows.name: As before, I desire that you show me no mercy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050906_MSG0006
rows.name:
Nothing would make me happier than for you to come
at me with all the intensity of real combat.[ST:wait ]
